entry.string: Admin Name is the name that emails generated by Xaraya will use in the from field.
entry.translation: Der Admin-Name ist der Name, den die Emails, die von Xaraya generiert werden, im Absenderfeld verwenden.

entry.string: Admin Email is the email address that emails generated by Xaraya will use in the from field.
entry.translation: Die Email-Adresse des Admin ist die Email-Adresse, den die Emails, die von Xaraya generiert werden, im Absenderfeld verwenden.

entry.string: If you would like the names of the templates used displayed in the emails, check this box.
If you would like a different reply to address attached to emails that are generated by Xaraya, check this box.
entry.translation: Diese Box anklicken, wenn eine abweichende Antwort-Adresse den von Xaraya generierten Emails angefügt werden soll.

entry.string: Enter your reply-to name which will be attached to emails addressed to you.
entry.translation: Den Namen eingeben, an den die Antwort-Mails adressiert werden sollen.

entry.string: Enter your reply-to email address which will be attached to emails addressed to you.
entry.translation: Die Antwort-Emailadresse eingeben, die für Antworten verwendet werden soll.

entry.string: Check this box if you would like Xaraya to send HTML formatted emails rather than plain text.
entry.translation: Diese Box anklicken, wenn Xaraya eher HTML-formatierte Emails als reine Text-Emails versenden soll.

entry.string: Check this box if you would like to setup HTML headers and footers on the HTML email you send out.
Enter the header that you wish displayed in your HTML emails.
Enter the footer that you wish displayed in your HTML emails.
Check this box if you would like to setup text headers and footers on the text emails you send out.
Enter the default word wrap for text email messages.
Enter the priority to send messages.
entry.translation: Die Wichtigkeit eingeben, mit der die Mitteilungen gesendet werden sollen.

entry.string: Enter the encoding to send messages.
Select the default method to send mail Mail should work in most cases, however Windows installs might need to use the SMTP method.
Enter your SMTP host name: IE mail.xaraya.com.
If your SMTP server requires authentification, check the box.
entry.translation: Diese Box anklicken, wenn der SMTP-Server Authentifikation erfordert.
Geben Sie Ihr neues SMTP-Kennwort ein.

entry.string: Specify the interval to check for mails to send.
entry.translation: Den Zeitraum eingeben, nach dem geprüft wird, ob Mails zur Versendung anliegen.

entry.string: You need to install the 'scheduler' module for this
Please note that if you stop the scheduler or if it isn't triggered, previously scheduled mails will not be sent.
entry.translation: Bitte berücksichtigen, dass vorher geplante Mails nicht gesendet werden, wenn der Scheduler gestoppt bzw. nicht ausgelöst wird.

entry.string: Enter each string on a single line. Do not separate with comma, etc. Best use is %%string%% to ensure no conflict exists.
Enter each string on a single line in the same order as the search. Do not separate with comma, etc.
Check this box if you want to send all emails to a fixed address.
Redirect Emails to the email address below
Redirect Address is the email address that all emails are sent to in debugging mode.
Check this box if you want to suppress email sending for testing purposes.
